mapper.insert: INSERT INTO request_log ( request_id, method, path, query_string, handler, args, status_code, success, error_message, cost_ms, client_ip, user_agent, created_at ) VALUES ( #{requestId}, #{method}, #{path}, #{queryString}, #{handler}, #{args}, #{statusCode}, #{success}, #{errorMessage}, #{costMs}, #{clientIp}, #{userAgent}, #{createdAt} )
